CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 24, 1954, pg. 23 reads: "Democratic Easter Egg Hunt - The annual Easter Egg Hunt, sponsored by Curtis Williams and Susie Harris, Democratic committee people of the Sixth District, Fifth ward, was held Easter Monday with Prothonotary David B. Roberts as honored guest. Here a group of the many youngsters who were given candy, Easter eggs and chocolate rabbits is shown.  The candy and eggs were donated, for the most part, by merchants of the Herron Hill community, with Prothonotary Roberts also supplying part of the candy. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group of men, women, and children, standing on and running towards hillside during easter egg hunt
